Fovvre hymnes, made by Edm. Spenser Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599. Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599. Daphnaïda. aut
[4], 71, [1] p.
Printed [by Richard Field] for VVilliam Ponsonby, London : 1596.
In verse. Printer's name from STC. "Daphnaïda", originally published separately in 1591, has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
